title: Reports: Verify all the possible reports are available
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on 'Reports' at the top to bring up the reports page
And when you tap on the drop down under 'Select a Report Category:'
custom_expected:
Then you will see the all the possible reports:

allCampaign Types
information
text2Screen
text2Security
text2Win
voting

title: Reports: Selecting allCampaign Types
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on 'Reports' at the top
And tap on the drop down
And select 'allCampaign Types'
custom_expected:
Then you will see 7 options to generate reports:

Activity Report Past 24 Hours 
Activity Report Per ShortCode
Activity Reports for All Campaigns 
allVoting1CampaignsReport 
Area Code Report For All Campaigns 
Area Code Report Per Campaign 
Marketing Subscription Detail Report

title: Reports: Selecting information
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on 'Reports' at the top
And tap on the drop down 'Select a Report Category:'
And select information
custom_expected:
Then you will see 1 report that you can generate

Activity Report For All Information Campaigns

title: Reports: Selecting text2Screen
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you logged into campaign manager
And click 'Reports' at the top
And tap on the drop down for 'Select a Report Category'
And select 'text2Screen'
custom_expected:
Then you will see 3 reports to generate:

Activity Report For All Text2Screen Campaigns 
Text2Screen Activity Per Campaign 
Text2Screen Details Per Campaign

title: Reports: Selecting text2Security
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click 'Reports' at the top
And tap on the 'Select a Report Category' drop down
And select text2Security
custom_expected:
Then you will see 2 reports to generate:

Activity Report For All Text2Security Campaigns 
Activity Report Text2Security Campaigns Date Range

title: Reports: Selecting text2win
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click 'Reports' at the top
And tap on the 'Select a Report Category' drop down
And select text2win
custom_expected:
Then you will see 1 report to generate:

Activity Report For All Text2Win Campaigns

title: Reports: Selecting Voting
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click 'Reports' at the top
And tap on the 'Select a Report Category' drop down
And select text2win
custom_expected:
Then you will see 1 report to generate:

Activity Report For All Voting Campaigns

title: Reports: Viewing report
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a campaign
And there is a report generated
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on 'Reports' link at the top
And click on a report at the bottom
custom_expected: Then the selected report page should come up

title: Reports: Deleting report
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a campaign
And there is a report
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on 'Reports'
And click 'delete' next to the report you wish to remove
And click ok to confirm
custom_expected: Then the report you selected will be deleted

title: Reports: Dowload generated report
custom_preconds:
Given you are able to log into campaign manager
And there is a report generated
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And go to reports
And click on the download icon on the report you want to download
custom_expected:
Then you will being the download process for that report
And the excel document of the report should match the one you selected

title: Reports: Generate a report
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manger
And the user is able to generate reports
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And go to reports
And pick a report to generate from the drop down
And click the generate button next to the report
custom_expected:
Then a pop up message will appear saying:

"Your report request has been submitted. The Report should be available below for download after sometime."

And the report you generated will appear at the bottom with the correct "Request Time"
